Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] What is the status of the experimentel WARC
 support scheduled for version 1.10?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=8rIFPMW9olUaUHvIoOTcbpiB5PEU34bpGV1Ffhs7kQG9
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

Sï¿½ren Vejrup Carlsen wrote:
> What is the status of the experimentel WARC support scheduled for version 1.10?

In progress and expected to be included, but will be:

* very rudimentary (for example, only WARC 'response' records exactly 
analogous to ARC records will be written)
* experimental both with regards to the code (which will be in a 'needs 
testing' rather than 'well tested' form) and the format (which may 
change based on implementation experience, so WARCs written with the 
1.10 module may be incompatible with the eventual format)

A 1.10 release candidate is overdue, but expected by the end of this month.

- Gordon @ IA
